statements: DELETE FROM location_based_marketing WHERE id = 100 AND customer_email = 'john.doe@example.com';
DELETE FROM location_based_marketing WHERE customer_name = 'Alice Smith' AND customer_location = POINT(45.1234, -78.5678);
DELETE FROM marketing_data WHERE location_id = 10 AND budget < 500.00;
DELETE FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'purchase' AND interaction_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5 AND location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York');
DELETE FROM customer_purchase WHERE customer_id = 100 AND amount > 500.00;
